ygData.subject: Re: Inn Key's & Backpack makeing
ygData.msgSnippet: You need a Large Sewing kit , a High Quality pelt, and of course the backpack pattern.  I don t believe it matters what kind of pelt, but am not certain about
ygData.messageBody:
You need a Large Sewing kit , a High Quality pelt, and of course the
backpack pattern. I don't believe it matters what kind of pelt, but am not
certain about that. This will make a backpack with 12 slots rather than the
ususal 8.

Talarin Kal'Amon, High Elven Wizard

> >Also does anyone know what size sewing kit and what kind of pelt or hide
> >are required to make a backpack?
> >thanks for the help
> >
> >Albryno
> >High Elf Wizard
> >
> >
